Articles.Content: I've been getting into RO lately and have been having problems with the FASA parachutes. Even fully deployed they seem to have no effect whatsoever on the speed of my capsule, whether it be for Gemini, Mercury or Apollo. I've seen the thread for it and attempted to create a .cfg file to fix the issue, but to no avail. I play with RealChutes and FAR. Can anybody help me out? (KSP 1.8.1)
I don't know why. What if you used normal chutes?
